MENU

Frequently Asked Questions

If the following questions and answers don't help provide understanding,
please send an email to shoutoutplayapp@gmail.com

Do I need a Spotify Premium account to use?

Yes. Spotify requires a Premium account to stream full length music tracks.

Can I use Apple Music or Google Play Music?

Additional music streaming service integrations are being evaluated and I hope these 2 services can be made available in the future.

I see my Spotify playlists, but are changes made in the app synced back with Spotify?

When you login, your Spotify playlists are populated in the app. Any changes you make in ShoutOutPlay are not synced back to Spotify, however this under development at the moment. Expect an update over next couple months which provides this feature.

If I uninstall this app, do I lose my shoutouts?

No. Your shoutout recordings are all backed up to a database and will be restored when you reinstall the app and log back into the same account on iOS or Android.

Sometimes tapping login button goes to Spotify then returns to ShoutOutPlay, but doesn't log me in?

This can occur sometimes if you have the Spotify app installed and it has been running in the background for awhile. Just force quit both apps, ShoutOutPlay and Spotify. Then open ShoutOutPlay and tap to login again. It should succeed this time.

What file types are my shoutouts recorded as?

They are recorded as .m4a files on both iOS and Android.

Can I request more features?

Yes! That would be greatly appreciated. You can send an email to shoutoutplayapp@gmail.com.

Still need help?
